privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.metaDescription: Privacy policy for DroneAgri.pl shop - official XAG distributor in Poland. Learn how we protect your personal data.

administrator.title: Data Administrator
administrator.content: The data administrator is IMEGA Sp. z o.o. based in Rybnik, ul. Smolna 14, 44-200 Rybnik, Poland (NIP: 6423233602).

dataCollection.title: Data Collection
dataCollection.intro: We collect the following categories of data:
dataCollection.personalData: Personal identifiers: name, address, email address, phone number
dataCollection.businessData: Business information: company name and operational details
dataCollection.technicalData: Technical data: IP addresses, browser types, device information
dataCollection.usageData: Usage data: visited pages and time spent on site

dataRetention.title: Data Retention
dataRetention.content: Information is kept for the duration of contractual relationships and applicable legal obligations, or until consent withdrawal or formal objection.

dataRecipients.title: Data Recipients
dataRecipients.content: Information may be shared with IT service providers, marketing agencies, courier companies, accounting firms, and public authorities when legally required. Cross-border transfers outside the European Economic Area do not occur.

userRights.title: User Rights (GDPR)
userRights.complaint: Right to lodge a complaint with supervisory authority

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.disable: You can disable cookies through browser settings, though this may limit functionality.

security.title: Security
security.content: We use SSL encryption, secured databases, and access control in compliance with GDPR requirements.

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.metaDescription: Terms of service for DroneAgri.pl shop - official XAG distributor in Poland. Sales conditions for agricultural drones and robots.

general.title: General Provisions
general.content: IMEGA Sp. z o.o., based in Rybnik (ul. Smolna 14, 44-200), operates shop.droneagri.pl selling professional agricultural platforms including XAG drones and ground robots. Customers must be adults with legal capacity. Consumers are individuals purchasing for non-professional purposes.

technical.title: Technical Requirements
technical.content: Internet access and JavaScript-supporting browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari, Edge) required. Minimum screen resolution: 1024Ã—768 pixels.
technical.prohibited: Users cannot engage in unlawful activity, violate others' rights, disrupt site functionality, or distribute illegal content.

orderProcess.title: Order Process
orderProcess.confirmation: Seller verifies details and availability. Sales contracts form upon payment confirmation.

delivery.title: Delivery
delivery.content: Products shipped throughout Poland and EU via courier services. Delivery typically takes 2-7 business days depending on availability.

withdrawal.title: Withdrawal Rights
withdrawal.content: Consumers have 14 days to withdraw from distance contracts without penalty. Written withdrawal statements preserve the deadline. The period begins from receipt date.

complaints.title: Complaints
complaints.content: Seller guarantees defect-free goods. Customers report defects within one year of discovery (if discovered within two years post-delivery). Seller responds within 14 days.

warranty.title: Quality Guarantee
warranty.content: One-year warranty from receipt covers manufacturing defects on Polish/EU territory only.
warranty.exclusions: Excludes improper installation, misuse, neglect, or normal wear. Remedies include: repair, replacement, or price reduction/refund.

dataProtection.title: Data Protection
dataProtection.content: Customer data processed per Polish personal data legislation and electronic services law. See Privacy Policy for details.

finalProvisions.title: Final Provisions
finalProvisions.content: Disputes resolved per applicable law. Consumers may access alternative dispute resolution via UOKIK, RZU, or regional consumer protection offices. Business disputes handled by courts at seller's headquarters. Polish law governs unregulated matters. Terms don't limit statutory consumer rights.

cookies.message: This site uses cookies to provide the best quality of service. By continuing to browse, you consent to their use.
